nodes.text: The human father of Corellian Resistance member Miru Nadrinakar worked as a historian. During the rule of the Galactic Empire, he still believed in the Galactic Republic and the Jedi Order until the Empire took action against him. Nadrinakar would later tell the antiques dealer Antron Bach about her father.
Miru Nadrinakar's father was mentioned in "The End of History", a short story written by Alexander Freed and published in Star Wars Insider 154 in 2014.
